# Scatter Diagram
```{r}
Scatter_Diagram <- function(year)
{
  library(readxl)
  library(moments)
  library(RColorBrewer)
  options(scipen=999)# 不使用科學記號
  
  data <- read_excel("data/bus_efficiency_revised.xlsx", sheet = 2)
  #data
  data_one_year = list()
  len = length(year)
  for(i in 1:len)
  {
   data_one_year[[i]] = data[data[, "Year"] == year[i],]

  }
  
  items <- c("公車行駛段次", "公車行駛里程", "公車載客人次", "公車每段平均載客", "客運收入", "公車每車公里營收")
  labs = c("次數（萬次）", "里程（萬公里）","人次（萬人）", "人次","元（萬元）", "元")
  for(i in 3:7)
  {
    
    for(j in ((i+1):8))
    {
      for(k in 1:len)
      {
        data_x = as.numeric(unlist(data_one_year[[k]][, i], use.names = F))
        data_y = as.numeric(unlist(data_one_year[[k]][, j], use.names = F))
      
        main = paste( year[k], "年 ", items[i-2], " - ", items[j-2], " 分布圖",sep = "")
        r = cor(data_x, data_y)
        sub = paste("相關係數：", r)
        xlab = paste(items[i-2], "（", labs[i-2], "）", sep = "")
        ylab = paste(items[j-2], "（", labs[j-2], "）", sep = "")
        plot(data_x, data_y, main = main, pch = 16, col = "orange", xlab = xlab, ylab = ylab, cex = 0.6, sub =sub)
        abline(lm(data_y~data_x), col = "red")
      }

    }
  }
}
```


```{r}
Scatter_Diagram(100:107)
```
